plot: Derek's psychiatrist is determined to teach Derek how boys are supposed to behave. When Derek disagrees, however, it becomes more and more clear that the psychiatrist may not know either.
title: Derek
plot_es: Derek's psychiatrist is determined to teach Derek how boys are supposed to behave. When Derek disagrees, however, it becomes more and more clear that the psychiatrist may not know either.
plot_en: Derek's psychiatrist is determined to teach Derek how boys are supposed to behave. When Derek disagrees, however, it becomes more and more clear that the psychiatrist may not know either.
